thread.title: Keanu Reeves' Partner Denies Marriage Rumors
thread.title_full: Keanu Reeves' Partner Denies Marriage Rumors

author: Jung A-im
title: Keanu Reeves' Partner Denies Marriage Rumors
text: Hollywood actor Keanu Reeves (61)’s partner Alexandra Grant (52) directly denied recent marriage rumors.Alexandra Grant posted a photo of herself kissing Keanu on her Instagram on the 24th, writing, “This is a real photo. It’s not an engagement photo, nor an AI-generated marriage announcement. It’s just a kiss! (Though our slightly playful expressions might suggest it’s the moment right before or after the kiss.)”The photo she shared shows the couple holding hands and kissing.Alexandra added, “We’re currently at the Roden Crater, and Keanu and I had just finished an interview with James Turrell. I’m posting this photo to thank everyone who congratulated us on our marriage. But we are not married.”She continued, “While it’s true that good news is needed these days, please be cautious—this is fake news! Instead, here’s a little real happiness to share.”Earlier on the 23rd, the U.S. entertainment outlet Radar Online cited a source claiming, “Reeves secretly married Alexandra.” According to the report, the couple held a quiet wedding during their European trip this summer. The source stated, “They had discussed marriage for years and ultimately wanted to spend time alone together.”In response, Alexandra addressed the marriage rumors by sharing the photo. Alexandra, a renowned visual artist and writer, met Keanu at a party in 2009. They co-authored the book *’Song of Happiness’* and developed their relationship over years as colleagues before becoming a couple. The pair publicly confirmed their relationship in 2019.
